floodArea.county: Bournemouth, Christchurch and Poole, Dorset Council

items.message:
Strong Easterly winds and spring tides may cause large waves and spray overtopping on the coast at Swanage Bay this evening. All other coastal areas are not expected to see impacts.
Areas most at risk include Swanage - Mowlem slipway, The Square and High St slipway areas.
Flooding is possible between 09:45 PM on 29/08/2022 and 01:00 AM on 30/08/2022.
It is expected that larger waves may cause water to spray over the top of sea walls in these specific areas of Swanage bay.
After this tideâ€š the weather is more settled and no further impacts are expected.
We will continue to monitor levels closely.
Consider activating any property flood protection products.
